message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I'm asking for $11,000. I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the value I'll get from the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $10,500. This product will truly benefit you, and I believe this price reflects its value.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
